text: Frederic Berthold (born 3 June 1991) is an Austrian World Cup alpine ski racer. Berthold specializes in the speed events of Downhill and Super-G, and also competes in the combined event. ==Career== Berthold made his World Cup debut at age 19 in February 2011 in Bulgaria at Bansko and finished thirtieth in the combined.FIS World Cup - Men's Super Combined - Bansko (BUL) - 26.02.2011. International Ski Federation He made his first podium in January 2017 in the combined at Wengen.FIS World Cup - Men's Alpine combined - Wengen (SUI) - 13.01.2017.
